name: Rishab
subtitle: Product Engineer @ Intercom
aboutMe: I'm a Product Engineer focused on building impactful, user-centric products. I work across the product lifecycle—from shaping early ideas and developing new features to fixing real-world issues reported by users. I ship fast and often, prioritizing momentum and learning through iteration. I'm always looking to improve—whether it's the product, the codebase, or my own skills. I enjoy solving meaningful problems through thoughtful design and code, and delivering experiences that feel simple, fast, and intuitive.
